an8.69:1.3: Khattiyaparisā, brāhmaṇaparisā, gahapatiparisā, samaṇaparisā, cātumahārājikaparisā, tāvatiṁsaparisā, māraparisā, brahmaparisā.
an8.69:1.4: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, anekasataṁ khattiyaparisaṁ upasaṅkamitā.
an8.69:1.5: Tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpannapubbā.
an8.69:1.6: Tattha yādisako tesaṁ vaṇṇo hoti tādisako mayhaṁ vaṇṇo hoti, yādisako tesaṁ saro hoti tādisako mayhaṁ saro hoti.
an8.69:1.7: Dhammiyā ca kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṁsemi.
an8.69:1.9: ‘ko nu kho ayaṁ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:1.10: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
an8.69:1.12: ‘ko nu kho ayaṁ antarahito devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:2.1: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṁ, bhikkhave, anekasataṁ brāhmaṇaparisaṁ …pe…
an8.69:2.8: Tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpannapubbā.
an8.69:2.9: Tattha yādisako tesaṁ vaṇṇo hoti tādisako mayhaṁ vaṇṇo hoti, yādisako tesaṁ saro hoti tādisako mayhaṁ saro hoti.
an8.69:2.10: Dhammiyā ca kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṁsemi.
an8.69:2.12: ‘ko nu kho ayaṁ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:2.13: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
an8.69:2.15: ‘ko nu kho ayaṁ antarahito devo vā manusso vā’ti.
